question: On Friday prayers Imam make du'aa in Khutba, but he doesn't make duha after the farz namaz. Does the Namaz accepted? Same thing in regular days imam doesn't make duha after the farz namaz
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is not necessary to make Du?aa after any Fardh Salaat. It is advisable and encouraged to do so.

If the Imaam did not make Du?aa after Fardh Salaat, the Salaat will be valid.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
